content: holly jolly circles motif - designed by juan the yarn addict materials  any 4 wt yarn in colors white red and green  hook size 6mm/us j abbreviations/meanings chain chain double_crochet double_crochet fpdc front post double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet single_crochet st s stitch/stitches tc treble_crochet set up start with white chain 5 slip into the first chain to make a circle round 1 chain 1 doesn t count as anything put 16 double_crochet into the circle slip st into the first stitch to close round round 2 cluster stitch change to red chain 1 does not count yarn over go back into the stitch you just came out of pull up a loop yarn over go back into the same stitch pull up a loop yarn over and pull through all 5 loops chain 1 to lock repeat in each stitch of the round slip_stitch into the first double_crochet to close round round 3 v_stitch change to white chain 1 does not count place a v_stitch 1 double_crochet chain 1 1 double_crochet in the first chain space from the previous round in between the cluster stitches continue placing v-stitches in every chain space until the end of the round slip_stitch into the first stitch to close round round 4 popcorn change to green chain 1 does not count place a *popcorn in the middle of the first v_stitch chain 1 to lock chain 2 to move on continue placing popcorn stitches into the center of each v_stitch until the end of the round slip_stitch to the top of the first popcorn to close the round *popcorn 1 work 5 double_crochet double_crochet stitches in the same stitch 2 drop the loop from your hook 3 insert your hook from front to back under the top two loops of the first double_crochet of the group 4 grab the dropped loop with your hook and pull it through the stitch one front popping popcorn is complete round 5 front post double_crochet change to red chain 1 does not count place 1 fpdc around the second stitch of the v_stitch 2 row below place 1 fpdc around the next v_stitch double_crochet chain 2 continue placing 1 fpdc around the v_stitch stitches from 2 row below chaining 2 after each set of 2 sts for the last fpdc be sure to go around the chain and the stitch of the v_stitch slip_stitch into the 1st st to close the round now go back and push the popcorn through to the front of the windows made by the chain 2 spaces round 6 change to green chain 1 does not count place 1 double_crochet in the space between the fpdc and the popcorn being sure to capture both rings of stitches when looking at the back next place 1 fpdc around the two fpdc of the previous round then 1 double_crochet before the popcorn you ll have 1 double_crochet 1 fpdc 1 double_crochet place 1 fpdc around the back of the popcorn * 1 double_crochet
